long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block distracting websites, stay motivated, and boost your productivity with StayOnTasky. You can block specific pages and websites that derail your focus, and customize your blocklist to fit your needs. Stay on track with motivational messages and focus-enhancing features.
